CustomField.description: BODEV-1100: UserGem Past Account's OEM/Partner Account
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( UserGems__PastAccount__c ), ISBLANK( UserGems__PastAccount__r.OEM_Account__c ) ), NULL, UserGems__PastAccount__r.OEM_Account__r.Name )
CustomField.label: UG - Past Account OEM/Partner Account
